sentences: A joint SBI and SBSTA contact group co-chaired by SBSTA Chair Wojtal and SBI Chair Yauvoli.

SBI Chair Yauvoli informed that sub-items on Matters relating to Protocol Article 3.14 (adverse effects) and Progress on the implementation of Decision 1/CP.10 (Buenos Aires programme of work) will be addressed jointly in the response measures forum.
SBI Chair Yauvoli will convene informal consultations with interested parties on how to take up these items as needed.
Joint SBI/SBSTA consultations on Protocol Articles 3.14 and 2.3 (response measures) will be convened by SBSTA Chair Wojtal.
